name: Where are you brother?
description:
Dario Escudero was a normal person living a normal life and like anybody else, then  when a new war started it's country take him away from home put a gun in his hands and sended away like a lot of his friends and neighbours, like anybody else.

But this is not a story of glory, honor or patriotism. This is the story of his young brother.

Several years later, when the war ended all those who whent away could return home one way or another, but not Dario.

Rodrigo Escudero tired of waiting decide it's time for start looking for his older brother.
